Package: unacloud.pmallocators

[Java] Class VirtualMachineAllocator

    • unacloud.pmallocators.VirtualMachineAllocator

    • Abstract class with main methods to allocate deployments. Validates enough resources in physical machine and enough IPs in lab The purpose of this class is to be extended to code allocator algorithms

      Authors:
      Cloder

          Validates if there are enough IP to assign another execution in a physical machine
